about_the_game:
Elephant Games, the studio that brought you Grim Tales: Dual Disposition returns with the spine-tingling sequel Grim Tales: All Shades of Black!

Thinking she'd be able to enjoy a much-needed break, Anna Gray instead watches in horror as her loved ones mysteriously vanish right before her eyes! Soon she'll discover that a mystical portrait is missing and may be responsible for unleashing the chaos unfolding in her time. Follow the resilient Anna as she returns to a distant past to recover the enchanted picture, discover who or what is behind this tragedy, and save her beloved Dorian and Alice. However, this heart-stopping adventure is not for the faint of heart, so gather your courage for a hidden-object journey into imagination and peril with Grim Tales: All Shades of Black!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version. The Collector’s Edition includes:

  • Travel to the past to solve a mystery in the bonus game!
  • Become the ultimate adventurer with the helpful strategy guide!
  • Revisit and replay HOPs and mini-games to perfect your strategy!
  • Enjoy exclusive wallpapers, screensavers, music, and more!
  • Tons of collectibles and puzzle pieces to find!

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.
